text: Apani balunah ami ki allaha byatita an'ya pratipalaka khomjaba, athaca tini'i sabakichura pratipalaka? Ye byakti kona gonaha kare, ta tara'i dayitbe thake. Ke'u aparera bojha bahana karabe na. Atahpara tomaderake saba'ike pratipalakera kache pratyabartana karate habe. Anantara tini tomaderake bale dibena, yesaba bisaye tomara birodha karate.
